attributes.action: stop housing benefit paid to tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear prime minster,
please act quickly to stop housing benefit paid to tenants. time is running out because members of landlord associations and private landlords are thinking to vote for the tories because of the hassle and mess caused by paying direct to tenants. tenants with references and honest ones are disappearing with rent payments they received from councils. a lot of us lost their homes and businesses, it has caused a lot of hard ship to our families .
i have voted labour before, but now i am going to change. the damage is already done. i am loosing my business.
